00041 if (!isset($_SERVER['HTTPS'])) {
00042     header('Location: https://'.$_SERVER['SERVER_ADDR'].'/index.php');
00043     exit;
00044 }
00045 
00047 // Init minimal setup for login page
00048 $ROOT= dirname(dirname(__FILE__));
00049 require_once($ROOT.'/lib/setup.php');
00050 require_once($ROOT.'/lib/defs.php');
00051 require_once($ROOT.'/lib/lib.php');
00052 $IMG_PATH= '/images/';
00053 
00054 // Sessions are started in libauth.php
00055 // Need a session everywhere below, after successful Authentication() too
00056 require_once('lib/libauth.php');
00057 // This include is necessary, because $View->Controller() tries to print a helpbox
00058 // Such help boxes are never shown on login page (there is no UserRegion),
00059 // but not including this lib causes a fatal PHP error: white screen
00060 require_once('lib/libwui.php');
00061 
00062 require_once('lib/view.php');
00063 $View= new View();
00064 $View->Model= 'system';
00065 
00066 if ($_POST['Login']) {
00067     $_SESSION['USER']= $_POST['UserName'];
00068     Authentication($_POST['Password']);
00069 }
00070 else {
00071     if ($_SESSION['Timeout']) {
00072         // If user was already logged out, do not check timeout, LogUserOut() sets timeout to -1
00073         // Otherwise results in a loop
00074         if ($_SESSION['Timeout'] > 0) {
00075             if ($_SESSION['Timeout'] <= time()) {
00076                 LogUserOut('Session timed out');
00077             }
00078         }
00079     }
00080 }
00081 
00082 HTMLHeader(0, 'gray');
